rationale: Uses DSC-MRI with tracer kinetics PDE in CNN loss, validated on patients.

Uses modified PINN (FCNN) with Maxwell-derived PDE for electrical property tomography, validated on phantoms.
Physics-informed reduced-order model for brain hemodynamics validated against 4D Flow MRI.
WarpPINN uses hyperelastic regularization for Cine-MR registration, tested on volunteers.
Model-constrained deep learning for MRS metabolite quantification using quantum-mechanical simulations.
Physics-informed unsupervised DNN for CBF/ATT estimation in ASL MRI, compared to supervised methods.
PIND uses physics-informed loss to denoise high b-value DWI, validated on prostate cancer patients.
PINN fitting approach for IVIM parameters in cerebrovascular disease patients.
Physics-informed GAN-based method synthesizing contrasts from transient-state acquisition.
Estimates diffusion coefficient in brain using PINNs, validated with synthetic and MRI data.
PINNs incorporate diffusion into pharmacokinetic models for DCE-MRI vascularization data.
PINNs estimate patient-specific reaction-diffusion growth parameters for Glioblastoma from structural MRI.
Simulation-based physics-informed network (SPINNED) for DSC-MRI deconvolution.
PIFON-EPT uses Fourier Networks with Helmholtz equation for electrical property reconstruction.
XT-YT U-Net incorporates MR acquisition model for radial dynamic MRI reconstruction.
PINNs correct ferric ion diffusion in Fricke gel dosimeters measured via MRI.
Self-supervised deep learning (DIMOND) optimizes diffusion model parameters for microstructure mapping.
Reduced-order Navier-Stokes PINN estimates pulmonary artery pressure from 4D Flow MRI.
PINNs recover voxel-wise tissue response functions for DSC perfusion quantification.
T2-deblurred superresolution GAN modeling TSE physics, tested on mouse embryo models.
Joint B0 and image reconstruction in low-field MRI using physics-informed unrolled network (SH-Net).
Compares physics-informed RNNs (GRU/LSTM) for DCE-MRI parameter estimation in pancreatic cancer.
PINNs with Neo-Hookean model estimate prostate stiffness using MRI-derived geometries.
SUPINN estimates cerebral blood flow in infants from ASL using spatial uncertainty.
Fluid physics-informed CycleGAN derives 3D aortic hemodynamics from anatomical MRI.
Unrolled NN for cine MRI reconstruction using supervised dictionary learning.
PINN solves advection-diffusion inverse problem for molecular transport in brain ECS.
Super-resolution 4D Flow MRI using deep learning coupled with physics-informed pressure estimation.
Deep complex convolution network for fat-water separation compared in ad-hoc physics reconstruction.
Myo-DINO uses EPG-based loss for T2/Fat Fraction mapping in neuromuscular disorders.
Unsupervised physics-informed network (IVIM-NET) for IVIM fitting in pancreatic cancer.
Simulation-based DNNs for multiparametric ASL estimation compared to lookup tables.
Physics-informed k-space interpolation using heat diffusion prior for MRI reconstruction.
Finite Basis Physics Neural Network used to classify Alzheimer's disease from ADNI data.
Self-supervised PINN for phase-cycled bSSFP relaxometry compared to supervised methods.
Physics-Informed Autoencoder (PIA) for prostate microstructure profiling using hybrid MRI.
Neural ODEs with elasticity constraints for brain MRI and zebrafish registration.
PI-MoCoNet corrects motion artifacts using spatial and k-space consistency losses.
Unsupervised neural network for tri-exponential IVIM fitting in NAFLD patients.
Spatial-temporal unsupervised deep learning (STUDE) for DCE-MRI PK parameter estimation.
Physics-informed implicit neural representation for spatio-temporal MR fingerprinting.
Physics-informed synthetic data framework (PISF) for generalizable fast MRI reconstruction.
ElasticMorph adds Navier-Cauchy regularization to CNN backbones for brain registration.
Physics-informed motion correction (PHIMO+) for T2* quantification.
Joint image and motion estimation network for 3D MRI motion correction.
Input Parameterized PINN enhances resolution of 4D-Flow MRI using synthetic blood flow data.
Integrates FEA and PINNs for lumbar spine material property prediction from CT/MRI.
PINN-DADif uses adaptive diffusion priors with physics regularization for MRI reconstruction.
MRI-MECH models esophagus as flexible tube using 1D flow equations and PINNs.
